item.title: Language Models Are Few Shot Learners (2020)
item.description: In Language Models are Few-Shot Learners, it is shown that increasing the number of parameters of GPT-2 improves few-shot performance across various tasks. The proposed model, GPT-3, is an autoregressive language model with 175 billion parameters. Its architecture mirrors that of GPT-2, except that GPT-3 uses alternating dense and locally banded sparse attention patterns, similar to the Sparse Transformer.
